page.title: 16A Guide Company In Linslade
page.content: We have five patrols and each one has a leader. One night we had to light a fire using only two matches and then cook some pieces of spaghetti and tie them into a reef knot. It was great fun, but I came home stinking of smoke! Another night one of the Rangers (where girls can go after Guides) showed us how to make fake wounds. Some people had blisters made by putting red wallpaper paste on your arm with some hot wax dripped on the top. A few had gashes made with paste and a bit of stocking with a hole in the middle. I had a black eye because no-one else would dare! It was made with green, yellow and blue colouring and took ages to get off. It was very realistic. I really enjoy Guides.
